Summary: Student Wellness Managers are here to help you with academic and wellness questions . free counselling for all full-time NUS students . if you are in danger, please call 999 .
PitStop is a place to chill out and have fun . it is equipped with necessary skills to befriend and support peers . you can practice the 7 Pitstop Principles .

PitStop@Science Frontier canteen level 2 is open from 1.00pm - 5.00pm . if you require support or a listening ear, Student Wellness Managers are here to chat . free counselling for all full-time NUS students .
